revised_title: Observations on Coprozoic Flagellates and the Significance of the Kinetonucleus in Binucleate Flagellates
tldr: The author investigates the coprozoic flagellates found in goat and sheep dung, observing their movements, general characteristics, and the significance of the kinetonucleus in binucleate flagellates. The study provides insights into the biology and life-history of these flagellates and their role in the soil-protozoa.
